text:
@realDonaldTrump @RoyCooperNC @DanForestNC yea!
Boycott the guy who
put his Citizens FIRST!

The guy who STOOD UP
to the #BullyInChief
knowing
#Trump would ATTACK him.

It takes a lot of guts
to stand up to the school yard bully!

#IStandWithRoyCooper

Take your PETRI DISH
#COVID19
HATE CONVENTION
down the road jack! https://t.co/0WShZnHhen
